Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: I had the Vegan Aphrodite. The crust is tasty. The eggplant was not totally done and the hummus was missing. The cheese was a lot. I won't order here again. Would recommend Pizza Heart or Nnea.

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: Nice gluten free pizza, good options for toppings. Been here a few times and it has been consistent quality. Overall good.

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: Had the hot & spicy and the four seasons pizzas on gluten free crust. Honestly the best gluten free pizza be ever had! Very delicious. The crust was amazing and so were the staff. Will come again next time I‚Äôm in Amsterdam :) Thank you, Pizza Amsterdam!

Name: Pizza Amsterdam

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: Order took well over 1h to arrive and, when it finally did, the pizzas were so cold (delivered without a heating box, on a bicycle in cold weather, duh) that we had to put them in the oven. I ordered a gluten-free pizza without onions and ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: Best gluten free pizza I've ever tried.

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: Great tasting pizza, both gluten-free and regular. They evidently usually have vegan cheese, but were out when we went. There was some confusion on the phone. This place is mainly for delivery and take-out; there is only very limited seating inside. The pizza almost completely made up for the confusion, though.

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: Ordered delivery and they arrived early. Their gluten free pizza is good (not the best I‚Äôve ever had but definitely tasty - and the nicest I‚Äôve had in Amsterdam so far). I would recommend and will order from them again.

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text: Half of my order is always gluten-free and everything is very good. Big reason for sticking with them is that they are always friendly and fair. If they ever get anything wrong, they note it and fix it straight away or will remember it for your next order. Never any hassle...

Name: Pizza Amsterdam
Review Text:
One of the best pizzas in Amsterdam, also the Tiramisu is amazing.

Review Text:
Worst customer service imaginable. Avoid at all costs.

Update: Ordered on Uber Eats. Called four times regarding status, and was (incorrectly) told over the course of three hours that "it's on its way".
